CPMWiki, the foremost platform catering to esteemed brands and discerning audiences

We enable advertisers and publishers to connect with the most reputable brands and influential audiences, who hold a paramount position in the digital landscape

Some Word About Us

CPMWiki is a trusted ally for publishers, delivering impactful digital ad campaigns and personalized branded experiences across the nation. Our marketplace connects advertisers with influential publishers, fueling conversions and amplifying engagement on a local scale.

What We Do?

At CPMWiki, we believe in transparency, providing publishers and advertisers with fully integrated reporting that empowers them to make crucial daily decisions. Our data-driven strategy enables advertisers and publishers to match the perfect inventory with tailored campaigns and branded programs.
As proud owners and operators of esteemed Internet brands, we have a deep understanding of what’s needed to achieve genuine monetization. We value the “trust factor” and the importance of delivering on promises. Trusting your partner and delivering exceptional results are at the heart of our approach.

History

We came together by merging renowned brands, combining our extensive experience in media, monetization, and analytics. We set the new benchmark in digital content, offering a proven and reliable technology platform. Our platform seamlessly integrates with publishers and advertisers, ensuring a seamless transition. Consistently delivering outstanding outcomes for our partners is our specialty. We fully embrace the multi-channel approach to effectively reaching the intended audience with the perfect message. Whether it’s desktop, tablet, or mobile, we provide optimized experiences for publishers and advertisers at a massive scale.

Your Benefits:

Monetization

We specialize in bridging premium brands and trading partners for optimal results at scale.

Report

With our transparent reporting system, you’ll never have to wonder about the number of impressions or your earnings. We provide clear insights and eliminate any guesswork.

Optimization

Our advanced algorithms ensure optimal brand bidding across platforms, maximizing your advertising potential around the clock.

Timely Payments

Our extensive reach enables us to ensure swift payments to our valued publisher partners. We understand the importance of timely compensation, and our streamlined processes allow us to deliver prompt payments with efficiency and reliability.

Content Management Systems

If you require our website development services, we have perfected the art of optimizing WordPress with advanced cache and CDN technologies. This ensures lightning-fast site performance and the ability to handle high volumes of traffic effortlessly.

Customer Support

Our clients rave about us. As a U.S.-based company, we prioritize prompt communication via emails or Skype. Client satisfaction is our top priority, and you can expect a friendly and professional approach from our team at all times.

Simplified for Publishers! Maximize Your Earnings and Enjoy Timely Payments.

Publishers are always in pursuit of a streamlined ad serving and yield optimization solution that simplifies the advertising process, freeing up their time to concentrate on content creation and site development. Our comprehensive solutions empower you to maximize the potential of your website and mobile initiatives, spanning across various formats such as display, contextual, overlays, mobile, pre-roll, and intextual ads.

Advertise with premier brands you can trust and extend your advertising impact.

Navigating the complex world of advertising has become increasingly challenging, with fragmented efforts and difficulties in targeting key demographics. At CPMWiki, we simplify the process for advertisers by leveraging our expertise in technology, monetization, and delivering value-added solutions.

We empower advertisers to engage their audience through compelling ad experiences and quality content that aligns with their brand. Our advanced technology enables precise targeting and measurable results, ensuring that you reach the right audience for maximum impact.

With our portfolio of influential brands and partners, we connect advertisers with passionate consumers who care about the latest trends and products. Through our innovative technology platform, we facilitate targeted campaigns that drive meaningful results for advertisers.
